Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of aerobic streptococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan MICroSTREP plus® Panel for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of aerobic streptococci with Penicillin using instrument read capability
Indications for Use Summary: Determines quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of aerobic streptococci, including Streptococcus pneumoniae, using Penicillin concentrations on the MicroScan MICroSTREP plus® Panel, read manually or via MicroScan® WalkAway instrument
